description: There's not much hornier then a 21 year-old guy but even by those standards, Alej is a boy who loves sex as much as anyone we've ever met and has enough of it for the average baseball team. Sure, he has the face of an angel and a tall lean body but even so, I thought he must be exaggerating. Until I saw his concealed weapon...all nine inches of it and almost as thick around.  Though I never saw it soft, even after he shot - even limp he has a heavy hanging dick that look like it will cause him to topple over.He knows how to use all of his assets...on the back as well as the front and quickly added me to his fan club. Membership indeed has its privileges and a member this size is more then worth the price of admission!
title: Home Of The Whopper
